body.content:
Greetings

My dear Friend, God bless you for your response to my message. I want to
use this opportunity to let you know my plans with the money.

I inherited the funds through my late husband.  It has been my heart's
desire to use this money to establish a Charity Foundation but my health
condition is very bad. I have been suffering from a cancer terminal which I
have undergone all sorts of treatments from one hospital to another but no
solution yet, recently my doctor told me that I may not survive it due to
the gravity of my sickness. Having known my condition I have decided to
donate these funds to charity through your help because if i die that money
will be confiscated by the government of this country that is why i decide
to donate it now i am still alive.

After the transfer of the money to your account, I permit you to take out
20% of this money for your reward for handling this humanitarian work of
God.

If you accept and are ready to handle this humanitarian work of god on my
behalf please let me know because it will give me joy that all my late
husband's funds are donated to charity.

Furthermore, I will need to know more about you and your family to enable
me to put you in contact with the bank where the money was deposited by my
late husband so the bank will proceed on how to make the transfer to your
account because, My health condition does not allow me to do anything
presently.

Please send me more information about you, so that I can know you as I have
given you contact with my bank where the money was deposited by my late
husband.


1. Your full name................................
2. Your home address.............................
3. Telephone number ..........................
4. Occupation................................................
5. City..................................................
6. Country......................................................
7. Age......................................................

As soon as you send me more information about you, I will forward it all to
bank where my late husband deposit the fund to introduce you to the bank as
my foreign trustee partner and manager of my Charity Foundation, so they
can proceed legally and transfer the money to your account to enable you
carry out my last wish.

I write you this message from the hospital where I have been hospitalized
for the past 4 months ago preparing for my surgical operation soonest.
Please I will need your constant communications so I can put you in contact
with the bank before my upcoming surgery.

Waiting for your response,

Mrs, Mary Josen

On Fri, Aug 6, 2021 at 1:39 PM <eve@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Eve
>
>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
